mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.gongyinghsang_name as gongyinghsangName ,a.gongyinghsang_types as gongyinghsangTypes ,a.gongyinghsang_xinyong_types as gongyinghsangXinyongTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.gongyinghsang_content as gongyinghsangContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM gongyinghsang a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.gongyinghsang_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.gongyinghsangName},'%')
and a.gongyinghsang_types = #{params.gongyinghsangTypes}
and a.gongyinghsang_xinyong_types = #{params.gongyinghsangXinyongTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.gongyinghsang_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.gongyinghsangContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
